Constructor for input\-Filter class. Only first parameter is required.

constructor

\hline

\hline

\hline
int & {\em \$attr\-Method} & -\/ 0= allow just user-\/defined, 1= allow all but user-\/defined \\
\hline

\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
